mapper.select: SELECT aty.*, (SELECT count(1) FROM article a WHERE a.article_type_id = aty.article_type_id) AS articleCount FROM article_type aty order by aty.article_type_sort

SELECT aty.article_type_id, aty.article_type_name FROM article_type aty WHERE 1=1
and aty.article_type_parent_id = #{articleTypeParentId}
and aty.article_type_parent_id = NULL OR aty.article_type_parent_id = ''
ORDER BY aty.article_type_sort
